# Ignore Unity-generated folders
[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ogs/

# Ignore Visual Studio/JetBrains files
.vs/
*.csproj
*.sln
*.user
*.unityproj
.idea/

# Ignore OS/system files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Ignore crash/debug/log files
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.suo

# Auto-generated by Unity
Generated/

# Ignore hidden folders/files
*.swp
